heading: HR00523
0: RESOLUTION CALLING ON THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES OF THE 17TH CONGRESS TO GRANT CONGRESSIONAL APPROVAL TO THE COMPROMISE AGREEMENT BETWEEN THE INTERNATIONAL OIL POLLUTION COMPENSATION FUND (IOPC) FUND AND THE PHILIPPINE COASTGUARD TO SETTLE THE COUNTRY'S CLAIMS FOR THE CLEANUP OF THE 13 AUGUST 2006 M/V SOLAR I OIL SPILL OFF GUIMARAS ISLAND IN THE AMOUNT OF ONE HUNDRED FOUR MILLION SEVEN HUNDRED FIFTY-SEVEN THOUSAND AND THREE HUNDRED EIGHTY-NINE PESOS (PHP 104,757,389.00), PURSUANT TO SECTION 4, TITLE 19B OF EXECUTIVE ORDER NO. 292 OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE ADMINISTRATIVE CODE OF 1987
status: Pending with the Committee on ECOLOGY since 2016-11-09
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00523
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CALLING ON THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES OF THE 17TH CONGRESS TO GRANT CONGRESSIONAL APPROVAL TO THE COMPROMISE AGREEMENT BETWEEN THE INTERNATIONAL OIL POLLUTION COMPENSATION FUND (IOPC) FUND AND THE PHILIPPINE COASTGUARD TO SETTLE THE COUNTRY'S CLAIMS FOR THE CLEANUP OF THE 13 AUGUST 2006 M/V SOLAR I OIL SPILL OFF GUIMARAS ISLAND IN THE AMOUNT OF ONE HUNDRED FOUR MILLION SEVEN HUNDRED FIFTY-SEVEN THOUSAND AND THREE HUNDRED EIGHTY-NINE PESOS (PHP 104,757,389.00), PURSUANT TO SECTION 4, TITLE 19B OF EXECUTIVE ORDER NO. 292 OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE ADMINISTRATIVE CODE OF 1987
